Every time we tried to make a run it seemed like he came up with a Shaquille O'Neal basket. When he has that going, there is nothing you can do except hope that he misses some shots. Keith Van Horn scored 26, Derrick Coleman had 14 points and 14 rebounds and Eric Snow also had a double-double with 14 points and 10 assists.
